评论概述: Not what I thought it would be
评论详情: It’s soft and comfortable, but I was expecting a knitted sweater, not a warm pullover/shirt. Not the best quality but it still fits good and works well with my style.
Looks great on my daughter

Someone commented that it wasn't a sweater but a thick shirt. I wouldn't even consider it a thick shirt, it's regular of not on the thin side! Most definitely not worth the $34. I was looking for something that would keep me warm this winter and this is not it.

I wanted this to work so bad. It's a great material, pattern and cut, but it's so short. Even with my very high waist jeans it showed midriff with my arms down. The way it was cut, it actually didn't show my boobs when I reached up, which was a plus. But, though I like cropped styles, this is a true crop top and is meant to show your stomach. So keep that in mind.

评论概述: Cozy, cute, but cropped a little odd
评论详情: This sweater is sooo soft and cozy!! It has been perfect for lounging around the house this winter trying to stay warm. The pattern is fun and I love the colors. The only thing iis that it feels as if it is cropped weird, it's a little low for my liking and hits me mid-belly which makes it look like it is just a shirt I kinda outgrew. I I am also petite and 5'3" so take that into account if you have a similar frame.
Looks different from the pictures. Wears more like a thick t shirt, than an actual sweater.

This was a bit shorter on the cropped side, but its really soft and the pattern is so cute! I would say if you are the heavier chested side to size up because I bought in my size and it was just below my chest where I can't see myself wearing this a certain way or out. If it was longer I could wear with high waisted jeans, so just size up for length and a better fit for wearing out :)

I like this sweater a lot. It is super comfortable and I love the design and coloring. It fits like you’d expect and the material feels like quality. It’s warm and great for around the house or when you’re going out. Cozy and stylish. Certainly worth the money.

I just ordered this sweater and I’m very pleased with my choice. I ordered a size medium, and it’s true to size. I really like how it has a baggy fit but it doesn’t look excessively big. It’s still a flattering fit and shape, just more breathing room. The tribal ethnic print is vibrant and exactly like the photos, which I was so happy about. The print of this sweater is what made me love it most. It’s even more colorful and beautiful in person. It’s made of 85% cotton and 15% polyester, making it soft and stretchy, but still warm and cozy. The fleece lining feels amazing. I love the drop shoulder design—it makes the sweater even more comfortable and casual. The material is thick enough to keep me warm, but not too heavy. Plus, the boho vibe is just so fun and stylish. The package arrived right on time and was carefully packaged—nothing was damaged; no hanging strings, holes, stains, or weird smells. I also appreciate the easy care instructions: machine wash and air dry, which is how I prefer to care for mine. I’ve washed it a few times now, and it still looks as vibrant and new as the day I got it. It’s the perfect balance of style and comfort. If you're looking for a cozy, stylish sweater that's perfect for everyday wear, and comes with an affordable price.. this one is a must-have.
I returned this due to the crop cut being uneven. The bottom of the sweater looked as if it was cut in the dark.
I really love this sweater! It fits me perfectly and is both warm and incredibly soft. The texture is so nice, making it a cozy and stylish choice.
Very cute and cozy item. Can be used for casual cute fits, great for fall. Gives a vintage vibe. Highly recommend.
I love how warm this cropped sweater is! Super cute for winter this year with my baby bump and some black leggings. Ordered a Medium and still fits great with wiggle room (bust 38inch).

评论概述: Love it but definitely for cold fall weather
评论详情: I got a little hot first time wearing this and I wore it just as a shirt to. However, I wore it on a colder day and I was a nice temp throughout the day. Great for cold weather and good quality!

Bring on the colder weather! I love this cropped fleece, it's very soft and comfortable.  I'll pair it with black leggings and a longer tank underneath since its crop.  I really like the teal and maroon design and the plush fleece material. It's a perfect for lounge wear, or going out.  Ordered the medium and it fits true to size. I'm planning on packing this for my next winter trip up to the mountains.

This cropped knot is a perfect boho piece that’s both stylish and comfortable. The tribal pattern and vibrant colors are eye-catching and add a unique touch to my wardrobe. I love the slightly cropped fit, which pairs well with high-waisted jeans and skirts.  The sweater is warm and soft, great for cooler weather and the fabric is thick enough for a good coziness. Overall, it’s a fun and trendy addition, giving that perfect bohemian vibe!

This well-made cropped sweater is so soft and fluffy.  It is very warm.  The fabric is a medium thickness and very lightweight when worn (I don’t know why I thought this shirt would be heavy, but I did).  The top is comfortable and flattering.  I love the print, I ordered the white sweater, even though I usually wear solid colors.  This top looks great with jeans.  The top machine washes and dries very well.

This cropped sweater is super soft and adorable. I love that it's soft on both the inside and outside, and it's got a bit of stretch to it too. I usually wear a small or medium in tops, and I decided to size down to a small for this one. It fits perfectly and still has that loose, relaxed fit I like. The lantern sleeves are nicely done, and I'm loving how well-done the pattern is. I got the green color, and it almost has a Christmasy vibe with the colors, which is fun. Overall, I really love how cute and cozy it is.

I cannot wait for the cold temps to hit just so I can wear this ZAFUL Women's Tribal Aztec Print Crop Sweater! It’s more like a fleece sweatshirt than a sweater. It’s so soft, comfy and warm. It has just the right amount of crop that it doesn’t show the belly unless you raise your arms. I feel like the medium runs a tad smaller than the typical medium I’d wear from certain department stores. The print and the colors are awesome! I’m in love with this and may order more in different colors!

评论概述: Nice but thin and became itchy when machine dried
评论详情: It is very cute and soft! But Thin, also became itchy when dried in the dryer, using a dog brush will bring it back to its soft form though

This has a really cool design and it’s soft and comfortable. It will really keep you warm for the winter. The fit is great and so is the fabric against your skin. It did not fade in the wash and the shape stayed the same.

This top is very cute, warm and fuzzy! I love the pattern, the colors are bright and vibrant.  It’s so warm and soft to the touch.  My only complaint was the length.  It is quite a bit shorter than I expected.  I gave it to my daughter become it was more short than I expected.  She is 21 so she feels more comfortable in shorter tops.  I do really like it other than the length though.
This sweater is okay, it’s low quality, and soft, but much more cropped than I thought. It’s literally a crop top.
.....this is a belly shirt.  This is very soft and super cuddly. The design is the reason for ordering. Fabric is incredibly soft. Sleeves are good length, has lots of room.

This will be perfect for fall! This top is so soft and comfortable! I would recommend sizing up, especially if you are busty as it is a little tight in the bust area. The colors are gorgeous and vibrant and I love it! It is a nice quality material and will look great with a lot of outfits.

I expected this product to run small and I knew it was a crop length. It's even smaller and shorter than I expected. I wish the sleeves were a bit longer too. Aside from that, it's a nice shirt and the fabric is decent quality.
This is a very cute southwestern Sherpa top that is cropped and a little boxy. This fits just fine over my 20 week bump. I’m not sure how this will wash up and fear it may not last long.
Very cute

My wife is really happy with this sweater. The material is so soft and warm. She likes the thickness of the sweater and the warmth it provides without being bulky. It is a crop style and got to about her belly button. For reference she is 5’4 and about 130lbs and is happy what sized up to a medium. The colors look great in person and the fit is cozy and flattering. Overall she is happy with this sweater and thinks the price is fair for what you get. I hope that sharing my opinion and experience here provides you some value when shopping and deciding on something like this sweater, if so please let everyone know below.

评论概述: Runs a little small but overall cozy!
评论详情: This sweater is really unique. The fabric is like a fleece blanket, very cozy for the fall. I got an XL and I feel it did shrink a little after washing, so if you want an oversized look definitely go up a size or two. The pattern is accurate to the photos and the colors are quite vibrant. Overall a very cute sweater!

评论概述: Soft, comfortable with a bit of stretch
评论详情: This fleece is a nice light layer. It is very soft with a bit of stretch. It runs true to size. The craftsmanship and quality is ok. Pairs great with high waisted jeans or a cute skirt. I'll get a lot of use out of this during the fall season

Rarely are lantern sleeves well executed these are the exception! This sweater is soft, warm, but not overly thick. It's well proportioned hitting just the right length for the crop, I'm 5'5" and got a small. I love this sweater!

This is a comfy and really soft sweater. The pattern is sharp and bright. It's very soft, and it's not too thick, but it's thick enough to be cozy and warm.  I got an XL to keep it from being too cropped, but it's still pretty high up. So, if you want something that doesn't seem too cropped, this one might not be the one for you. However, if you want it to be cropped, then it's the perfect sweater if you're looking for a cozy, soft sweater.

This sweater is the perfect length, cut off at exactly the right spot. It still keeps you warm since it is a thick fleece, even with the length of it. The sleeves are a bit wider and then cuff off at the bottom, which gives it a bit more style. The only problem is that it doesn't match with much. Other than that, it's a well made product that is nice and warm!
The material is much different and not anything like the photos.

评论概述: Soft and cozy southwest style cropped sweater
评论详情: This soft and cozy crop sweater has a somewhat indigenous southwestern style print that’s really pretty. Ultra-lightweight, this only has a single layer, and it works best for cool weather, but not genuinely cold weather, unless you plan to add a lot of layers.

This cropped fleece top is so soft and comfortable! I love the pattern and deep colors. It does run a bit in the smaller side- so rennet that when ordering! I am “5’7” 185lbs. I got an XL and it fits just right, not oversized, and it is cropped so it runs on the shorter side. Great for throwing on and running out the door. Wear with anything! Really like this.
Can’t wait to order more!

I love this plush trend in clothing because I like being comfy and feeling like I’m wearing a blanket. This pullover is not only beautiful because of the design but it’s insanely soft and fits great too. I like that it’s a little on the thinner side so you aren’t getting overheated too quickly.
1. smells like cigarettes 2. very wide 3. scratchy materials 4. wrong color i ordered 5. SUPER late (2 weeks) shipping
This sweater is marketed as 85% cotton material but it’s actually a cheap 100% polyester sweater that will make you sweat. I’m pretty upset at that.

In the winter I need layers. I can go from freezing cold to hot flash hot in an instant, so my clothing needs to be flexible. This little sweater is going to get a lot of use. Not only do I love the color combo and Southwestern inspired pattern, but it's thin enough to take the chill off without overheating.  This is a crop design, so keep that in mind when ordering. I'm 5' 5" and 140lbs. and it sits just above my waist. It's baggy, though, so it's not an unpleasant fit. I hope it washes well as it's super soft and fluffy and I'd like it to stay that way. If there are issues I'll update my review.
Love the feeling of the top, good quality and exactly like the picture.

I love the cut/physical pattern of this top, but the fabric feels awful. It’s thin, yet scratchy and unbreathable. I just can’t get past the poor quality of the fabric, like I’m wearing a plastic shirt. :( Am returning. I so wish it were a different texture.
Love it. Its super comfortable 😌
I thought it would be knitted and the biggest size be “oversized” but Xl was a big as a simple crop. If I got my actual size there would be no way it would fit.

The photo gives off the illusion that the top is knitted. It’s actually dyed to look this way. Not at good quality as I would have hoped for as a gift I purchased for my daughter. Also, size up, as it is rather small even in a bigger size than she would usually wear it was snug. It’s thick, and warm, and does the job. It fades a little when washing so I recommend cold water and to hang dry.

评论概述: Not exactly what I was expecting, still cute
评论详情: The shirt is cute, it’s not a sweater more of a slightly heavier shirt. The colors aren’t true to the image, they are much more vibrant, orange is almost like the fruit, the green is more of a teal. I was hoping it would be the same though! Length wise it’s a bit shorter than pictured also. I’m 5’7 with a short torso, it sits just above my belly button, I have very high waisted jeans that may compensate. I love a crop top, but more of a peek-a-boo moment as opposed to a full belly statement. This crop leans closer to a full belly. With sizing, possibly sizing up may help with the length issue . It is oversized as is, I ordered a small and I have a lot of room it doesn’t fit close at all. I intend on keeping it as I do like it, but keep in mind you may get a product that’s slightly off from what is pictured

So first off it is super cute and soft but it is extremely croped! Like just under the breast 🙄 not the look I was going for . But if you don't mind that kind of top get for reference I'm 5'8 38c 172 pounds got a large

评论概述: Much cuter than expected if you know what you're buying!
评论详情: Purchased for my 12 year old. She wears a Kids L or XL and we bought this in a Medium. It is a little loose/oversized but proportionally it is very wearable. We could have gone for a Small but she did not want it super cropped. It is a very sweet shirt. It's lighter weight than a sweater but it is a knit. It reminds me of the knits we used to get in the 70's and 80's but with a softer/silkier hand. Wash on delicate and dry flat or tumble dry on lowest setting. It's perfect for Spring weather when it's cool in the mornings and in the 50's or 60's by afternoon. She absolutely loves it with jeans and Chucks.

Comfy, true to size and is long enough to be worn as a modest crop top or with a tank underneath for full coverage. I love the baggy sleeves with the tapered wrists for the comfortable yet styled look.
Comfy, durable, cute crop top!
I like the color and most of the shape but it doesn't look like the picture and the fabric is cheap...naahh
But my daughter loved it
Bought this for my 19yr old daughter for Christmas and she loves it.
super comfortable. thin and lightweight. great for breastfeeding
I just have to say why of why can't we have longer tops. All these cute tops are crop now. This one looks cheap and it feels cheap. I returned it.
The top is ok. Should of ordered size up
Soooo cute I love it and it's so comfy and perfect for layering it's a big smaller then I expected but still fits just a bit snug on my chest
I absolutely LOVE this shirt. It’s so funky and cute, and has the perfect crop length. It’s not super warm, just a basic long sleeve.
It’s great and very comfortable but does run a bit small.

评论概述: It snags on lace if you want to wear lace under it like I did!
评论详情: This crop top sweater I bought to wear at a concert! I got a lot of compliments on it! Buy it and it is true to size!

I ordered a medium because I wanted the sweater to not be super cropped. I am 5’5” tall and the size medium is perfect. It is nicely made, and super cute. This sweater is a great value and I strongly recommend it.
My daughter love this sweatshirt.
I bought this sweater for a granddaughters holiday gift. I think she liked it. I thought the knitting was good and would buy it again.

I'm not the owner of this account, it's my mom's, but I gotta share because I was super disappointed with this shirt. I expected it to at least go to my midriff but it doesn't, it barely covers anything at all. But the width of it is like an XXL and I got a large. Don't buy this shirt. It seems that it's a really hit or miss product.
I got this and had to send it back. the fabric had almost no texture and just looked really cheap.

评论概述: This sweater is wider than longer
评论详情: It was huge but short. Not a very good purchase. I got mediums and they were made for 3xxlg and a very short person!
This sweater has such a great feel to it. It is really soft and NOT scratchy like some sweaters can be. It did take a while for shipping but overall a good experience.

评论概述: It’s a cute SHIRT… it is NOT a sweater
评论详情: This is marketed as a knit sweater.. it is NOT A SWEATER. It’s “knit” in the same way a tshirt is “knit”…It’s made from fabric, not yarn. Don’t get me wrong— it’s really cute, and the fabric is soft. It feels like a synthetic blend with some cotton in there somewhere. Just don’t buy this if you’re bent on getting a sweater!!! Again… it’s a SHIRT! I gave it 2 starts only bc of the way it is marketed. If it was marketed as a SHIRT I’d be scoring it way higher bc it is cute and I’ll still get a lot of wear out of it.

this is such a cute sweater. it’s cozy on the inside but a tad thin. the only thing i would differently in this would be sizing up. i got a small and it fits perfectly but i was definitely going for more of a bigger fit. other than that its amazing
I got a small and it was a little more baggy than expected. Very cute, but very thin sweater.

评论概述: Not how it looks in photos
评论详情: Disliked material. Not actually a knitted sweater. Polyester feel. Not slouchy.

I wanted to share a photo since I found some discrepancies in the length and other reviews (this only applies to this pattern because it could vary between patterns) . I am 5’3. 120 pounds and this comes just to my bellybutton works perfectly with high-rise jeans.  However. I will say the sleeves are a little long on me but it’s fine because it’s supposed to be kind of oversized and it typically push-up sweater sleeves most of the time anyways.  I’ll also mention this has like some fuzzy lining on the inside so it’s super warm.  Would recommend overall !
My daughter loves the sweater! Mom wishes it was a little longer.
She liked it!
Ordered the largest size and it should've fit length wise, but it was still a little too short. I realize that it's a cropped shirt, but I specifically ordered it larger so it wouldn't be cropped

评论概述: Very cute but not a sweater
评论详情: It's cute and fits like expected however the material is very thin and not a sweater at all.
Got this for my sister for Christmas and she loved it.
Color off
Sleeves are long great fit I’m 5’9” 180-185 large bust and it fits perfectly.
Great

评论概述: Not a real sweater more like you're wearing leggings as a long sleeve shirt
评论详情: Not at all what I expected from a supposed 15% polyester and 85% cotton. It feels 100% polyester. It's feels more like you're wearing leggings as a sweater. I expected a real sweater material and feel when purchasing.
Not at all what I was expecting. I was expecting the color on the left, and received the color on the right. Too bright for my liking.

I bought 2 sweaters, the Multi B and the Multicolored  (with red stripes). The multicolored is NOT a sweater. Both are advertised under the same listing, just different prints, but they are aggressively different in all the ways. The Multi B is my favorite. I WOULD consider this a sweater-like material, it's flattering and so comfy. The multicolored....not even close to sweater material. It has a cheap look to it and would be more considered a long-sleeved cropped shirt. Overall, I rated this a 3 because of the advertisement differences between the 2 products being listed together as the same. The seller should create 2 different listings and specify each product's EXACT specs. Overall, not as advertised.
Muy lindo medida exacta
Great top! I always get compliments, and everyone thinks it's vintage, not Amazon!
The design is printed on some cheap material. There is nothing knitted about this shirt. The listing is misleading.
Super cute and true to fit!
If I let her my teenage daughter would wear this every day. She says it’s very comfortable. It’s long enough that it doesn’t show her midsection. I would purchase again
Very cute ! Not sweater material . More elastic . Still comfortable though .

This quality is dreadful. It does not look anything like what I expected from the pictures in my opinion. It is NOT a sweater lmao. Farthest thing from it.  I was trying to show the material in the Pic. Doesn't really do it justice. It is thin which is fine but the material and quality is just awful.  It actually does look kind of cute on when you aren't up close but it is also a bit more cropped than I would like, especially if you have any tits at all.  Like it didn't even drape over them to wear the bottom of them were covered lol. I feel like my toddler could see my underboob if looking up at me hahaha.  I figured my stomach would barely show and/or only show with movement but it definitely shows even with most high rise jeans or leggings. I got it on sale for like 1499 and even that is not worth this top in my opinion, but it could work for some. Like I said, it did seem kinda cute on.
I love the color and pattern. Is a cute fit and runs small. My biggest issues however is the thinness of the shirt. Not very warm and feels like a very synthetic shirt
Fit very boxy, scratchy and cheap material

I was expecting a normal-sized sweater but the top stops above my belly button. Overall more of a box top so if you are looking for a box top sweater this should be a good fit. Part of the problem is likely due to me being 5'3" with a 36DD chest and I ordered a large.
Just as shown
Very short crop. But my taste is a little longer than the one I reviewed.
Small fit and thin material

I bought an XL because I like extra long sleeves. The torso is the same length of a large, so it's just wider in XL. But my main complaint is the quality of stitching it's very poor, see photo. I'm not going to return it because I really like the print and if I return it, the company is just going to throw it away. So I'm going to fix it myself and keep it. Just buyer beware.
I got a large one so it wouldn’t be cropped. I wish it was longer and more of a wool material. Not what I was picturing.
